basic_info.description: I am a full-stack developer with a background in editorial and client services, which means I have a solid foundation of team communication, an obsession for detail, research, and a knack for inspiring cross-functional teams. I specialize in full-stack JavaScript technologies (MERN Stack - MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) to build complete web applications with API systems with responsive user interfaces.

projects.title: Twitter 2.0
projects.description: Completed in a single week with a Software Engineer a full-stack web application using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js (MERN) and a user-empathetic interface with full-CRUD (create, read, update, and delete) capabilities through RESTful routing. Backend contains two database models (a tweets and comments schema) which serves user JSON data to the front-end.

projects.title: The Weather Window
projects.description: A client-rendered application that leverages third-party API and the read-only Navigator.geolocation property to deliver immediate weather forecast results for client's current and future weather. Collaborated with a Software Engineer in a one week sprint, engaged in daily-standups, worked on separate tickets, co-coding on blockers, and practicing version-control to create the wireframe, user stories and development of the application using React.js, JavaScript, JSX, and Node.js.

Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: Candy Crush Memory Match
projects.description: A browser-based game to engage users in a Candy Crush Saga inspired memory matching game.
